message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $15000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is subjective, but based on my research and needs, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

counteroffer: I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $14000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the research I've done.

message: I understand that $10000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to go up to $13000. This is my final counteroffer for now. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to counteroffer at $12500. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.

counteroffer: I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go up to $12500. I'm willing to make another counteroffer, this time at $14500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the research I've done.

message: I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $14000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

Thank you for considering my previous counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to move forward with a counteroffer of $13500. I hope this proposal will lead to a mutually beneficial agreement.

counteroffer: I'm not willing to go up to $13500, Bob. I've already made concessions and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'll make one final offer: $15000, and that's my absolute last offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

message: I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go any higher than $15000, Bob. I'm confident that this is a fair price for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider selling the product to someone else.
